file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 29-10-04-02 - ELECTRIC MOTOR-DRIVEN PUMP - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELECTRIC MOTOR-DRIVEN PUMP - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do an replace/discard of the electrical motor brushes of the EMDP. B. To do the replace/discard of the brushes, it is necessary to remove them from the electrical motor of the EMDP. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELECTRICAL MOTOR BRUSHES - RE- ALL 29-10-04-900-801-A ♦ PLACE/DISCARD EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 29-10-04 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 29-10-04-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELECTRICAL MOTOR BRUSHES - REPLACE/DISCARD A. General (1) The function of this procedure is to replace/discard the electrical motor brushes. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM TASK 29-10-04-000-801-A/400 EMDP - REMOVAL AMM TASK 29-10-04-400-801-A/400 EMDP - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 193 193BL Hydraulic system 1 193 193CR Hydraulic system 2 D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE Hydraulic compartment of system 1 and 1 Does the task system 2 I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove access panel 193BL and (or) 193CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (2) Remove the EMDP ( AMM TASK 29-10-04-000-801-A/400). J. Replace EMDP Brushes (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of the Vickers CMM 29-10-60 to replace/discard the electrical motor brushes of the EMDP. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 29-10-04 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the EMDP ( AMM TASK 29-10-04-400-801-A/400). (2) Install access panel 193BL and (or) 193CR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 29-10-04 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
